title: Pokemon Project
intro: A demo Pokédex built with Next.js and Tailwind CSS, using the PokéAPI to fetch and display Pokémon data. Features include search functionality and a responsive UI, showcasing API integration and modern frontend development skills.
description: This project is a demo Pokédex built with Next.js, integrating the REST-based PokéAPI to fetch and display Pokémon data. It allows users to search and browse Pokémon, presenting key details in a clean and responsive interface styled with modern frontend tools. Designed as a school project, it showcases my ability to work with external APIs, manage dynamic data, and build user-friendly applications using Next.js and Tailwind CSS.
